name: The Maestromusic
overview: The Maestro Music put the player in the role of an orchestra conductor armed with a conductor's baton, you take charge in guiding an orchestra or group of musicians into symphony through passage to crashing conclusion. Conductors daintily move their wands and band members eyeball that wand in order to play the music. Make the wrong move and discord enters the melody but flow like water and you're on your way to victory. The game features different music from different compositors (like Mozart or Beethoven) and the difficulty increased depending of the song. The game features also the baton stick controller to make the player feel like a real orchestra conductor. Manufacturer's description: An orchestra conductor waving a baton and a dedicated controller, simulation musical performances to complete a new sensation. If you shake a baton will soon play fast, loud, etc. If you shake that big, you can just get a feel for a real conductor. Play score of the composer as faithfully tempo and volume, Biyou the applause from the audience get a high rating. Features: First person perspectives. 2D graphics Cartoon graphics Orchestra conductor theme.
